Description: The subcortical labels from the CIFTI template.
License: Creative Commons license CC BY-ND (Attribution - No derivatives)
Name: CIFTI Subcortical

cifti_label.Description: The region label present in the CIFTI file.

color_red.Description: The red component of the region's specified color, ranging from 0 to 255.

color_green.Description: The green component of the region's specified color, ranging from 0 to 255.

color_blue.Description: The blue component of the region's specified color, ranging from 0 to 255.

opacity.Description: The opacity to be used when rendering the region, ranging from 0 to 255.
